posts.title: Culture Pass: Get Free Access to NYC Museums with a Library Card
posts.text: New York City is home to some of the most renowned cultural institutions in the world, and starting today, The New York Public Library is making it even easier for New Yorkers to enjoy these remarkable destinations with Culture Pass, a service that allows library cardholders to visit cultural institutions throughout the city for free.

posts.title: NYC Libraries Announce Fine Forgiveness for Kids and Teens
posts.text: Today, The New York Public Library joined together with Brooklyn Public Library and Queens Library to announce a fine forgiveness program that will give hundreds of thousands of students a fresh start.

posts.title: Join NYPL for #ReadersUnite
posts.text: Whatever you're reading, we can all agree on one thing: the need to read.
